eventDecorators.name: ComponentExchanged
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes this module to the SetToken. Only callable by the SetToken's manager.

parameterDecorators.name: _setToken
parameterDecorators.description: Instance of the SetToken to initialize.

functionDecorators.name: removeModule
functionDecorators.description: Removes this module from the SetToken, via call by the SetToken. Left with empty logic here because there are no check needed to verify removal.

functionDecorators.name: trade
functionDecorators.description: Executes a trade on a supported DEX. Only callable by the SetToken's manager. Although the SetToken units are passed in for the send and receive quantities, the total quantity sent and received is the quantity of SetToken units multiplied by the SetToken totalSupply.

parameterDecorators.name: _setToken
parameterDecorators.description: Instance of the SetToken to trade.

parameterDecorators.name: _exchangeName
parameterDecorators.description: Human readable name of the exchange in the integrations registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _sendToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token to be sent to the exchange.

parameterDecorators.name: _sendQuantity
parameterDecorators.description: Units of token in SetToken sent to the exchange.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiveToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token that will be received from the exchange.

parameterDecorators.name: _minReceiveQuantity
parameterDecorators.description: Min units of token in SetToken to be received from the exchange.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Arbitrary bytes to be used to construct trade call data.
